problem_text_en: Given Y is the midpoint of UW. Y is the midpoint of VX and UW . Complete the proof that UV∥WX . (Elements:  △WXY ,  ∠WXY ,  VY ,  △UVY ,  ∠WYX ,  ∠UYV ,  ∠UVY ,  UY ,  UV ,  WY ,  WX ,  XY , )
raw_statement: Y is the midpoint of VX
Y is the midpoint of UW
raw_reason: Converse of Alternate Interior Angles Theorem
